title: With Intel and AMD joining AI chip race, Nvidia takes one step ahead
text: Credit: DIGITIMES With the rapid development of generative AI and large language model (LLM) applications, the data center AI chip market size will also leap upward in 2023. While competitors AMD and Intel are set to get a piece of that pie, Nvidia, a dominant leader...
